keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plans to improve public health services, address challenges like alcohol and drug abuse, reduce bed years to treat NHS patients, strengthen GP commissioning of services, increase patients' commitment to their care, and control over their own treatments.

issues.health: Andrew has been working for six years to improve public health services and meet rising challenges like alcohol and drug abuse. He led policies to increase NHS resources in each year of the next Parliament, to strengthen GP commissioning of services, and to increase patients' commitment to their care.

politicalExperience.role: Shadow Secretary of State for Health
politicalExperience.achievements: Responsible for the health plan to improve public health services and address rising challenges.

contactInformation.address: 153 St. Neots Road, Hardwick, Cambridgeshire CB23 7QJ

quotes.text: We have the potential to be the best place in Europe for healthcare research and practice. I am determined to use my influence to make this a reality, benefiting every local family. Health is my priority. It is David Cameron's priority. It is a priority for all of us.
What is good for the NHS nationally will also be great for South Cambridgeshire

leaflet.additionalNotes: South Cambridgeshire is an internationally-renowned centre for healthcare, including Addenbrooke's and Papworth Hospitals. It also has the potential to become Europe's leading centre for bio-medical research.
